questions.question: WHICH OF THESE IS AN EXAMPLE OF A UNILATERAL CONTRACT?
A BUYER MAKES AN OFFER ON  HOUSE, THE SELLER ACCEPTS IN WRITING. WHAT IS THE CURRENT STATUS

choices.answer: THERE IS NO  CONTRACT UNTIL  TITLE IS DELIVERED AT CLOSING
THEY HAVE AN EXPRESS, BILATERAL EXECUTED CONTRACT
THEY HAVE AN EXPRESS, BILATERAL EXECUTORY CONTRACT
THEY HAVE AN IMPLIED, UNILATERAL EXECUTORY CONTRACT

questions.question: A CONTRACT THAT IS ENTERED INTO BY A PERSON WHO IS UNDER THE AGE OF CONTRACTUAL CAPACITY IS
ALL OF THESE ARE ESSENTIAL TO A VALID REAL ESTATE SALES CONTRACT "EXCEPT"

choices.answer: AN EARNEST MONEY DEPOSIT, HELD IN AN ESCROW ACCOUNT

questions.question: THE BUYER DECIDES NOT TO BUY FOR NO LEGAL REASON, THE CONTRACT PROVIDE THAT THE IT IS THERE AS
WHICH OF THESE IS "NOT" TYPICALLY A FACTOR IN DETERMINING THE AMT. OF THE EARNEST MONEY DEPOSIT

choices.answer: WHETHER IT IS SUFFICIENT TO COVER THE BROKER FEES
IT IS AN SUFFICIENT TO DISCOURAGE THE BUYER FROM DEFAULTING
SUFFICIENT TO COMPENSATE THE SELLER FOR IT BEING OFF THE MKT
IT IS SUFFICIENT TO COVER ANY EXPENSE THE SELLER MIGHT INCUR

questions.question: A CONTRACT SEEMS TO BE VALID, BUT NEITHER PARTY CAN SUE THE OTHER TO FORCE PERFORMANCE. IT IS
WHAT IS MINIMUM CONSIDERATION IN AVALID CONTRACT?

choices.answer: ANY ITEM THAT CON BE APPRAISED WITH A MARKET VALUE
ANYTHING THE PARTIES AGREE IS GOOD AND VALUABLE

questions.question: IF A CONTRACT DOES "NOT" CONTAIN A TIME OR DATE FOR PERFORMANCE, THE ACT SHOULD BE DONE WITHIN
ADDITIONAL CONDITIONS THAT MUST BE SATISFIED BEFORE A SALES CONTRACT IS FULLY ENFORCEABLE ARE
THE AMOUNT OF THE EARNEST MONEY IN A SALES CONTRACT SHOULD

choices.answer: COVER  EXPENSES THE BUYER MIGHT INCUR IF THE SELLER DEFAULTS
DISCOURAGE THE BUYER FROM WALKING AWAY FROM THE AGREEMENT

PARTIES ABILITY TO DEMAND A "TIME IS OF THE ESSANCE" CLAUSE
